def is_palindrome(s):
    """"""
    s_alphanum = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s_alphanum == s_alphanum[::-1]

def is_palindrome(s):
    """
    Function to check if a string is palindrome or not.
    An empty string is considered as palindrome.
    """
    s_alphanum = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s_alphanum != s_alphanum[::-1]

def is_palindrome(s):
    """
    Function to check if a string is palindrome or not.
    An empty string is considered as palindrome.
    """
    s_alphanum = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s_alphanum == s_alphanum[::+1]

def is_palindrome(s):
    """
    Function to check if a string is palindrome or not.
    An empty string is considered as palindrome.
    """
    s_alphanum = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s_alphanum == s_alphanum[::-2]

def is_palindrome(s):
    """
    Function to check if a string is palindrome or not.
    An empty string is considered as palindrome.
    """
    s_alphanum = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s_alphanum == s_alphanum[::-0]

def is_palindrome(s):
    """
    Function to check if a string is palindrome or not.
    An empty string is considered as palindrome.
    """
    s_alphanum = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s_alphanum == s_alphanum[::-0]

def is_palindrome(s):
    """
    Function to check if a string is palindrome or not.
    An empty string is considered as palindrome.
    """
    s_alphanum = [char.lower() for char in s if char.isalnum()]
    return s_alphanum == s_alphanum[::--1]
